entry.title: Keyboard Maestro Macro: Quoting a Website in Markdown — the Brooks Review
entry.content:
The benefit is that now I can select text on a page, hit the hot key and paste to my document, saving a bunch of extra clicks. It’s not the best, but it sped things up a touch for me.

Waini! Makin mudah lagi bikin postingan linked list. Tapi kalau pas kerja di Windows tetep aja kudu copy-paste manual.
